pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.18: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see Kd 8:3.1.6. | According to Kd 8:21.1.4 this is no smaller than 8 by 4 sugataṅgula, “standard fingerbreadths”.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.2.3: The Pali here reads appaccuddhāraṇasaññī , which must be an editing mistake. I instead follow the PTS reading, paccuddhāraṇasaññī.
